programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed teen millionaire Ephren Taylor preaches his "safe" investments at church seminars and on the internet, fleecing victims out of millions and pumping cash into flashy living and his wife's hip-hop career.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: The Bling Ring; The Fraudster, the Ex-Stripper and the Missing Millions
programme.desc: A group of wannabe-celebs make off with millions from Hollywood's rich and famous.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Middle-aged real estate investor finds young love and steals client money to impress his new bride.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: The Cunning Cowgirl Crook; Dollars for Dumps
programme.desc: A small town comptroller steals $53 million from her city to fund a horse-breeding empire; a crooked real estate developer lures victims to his phony residential oases.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A successful financial advisor's world crumbles under a multi-million dollar scam; a Chicago-area rapper convinces a local businessman that he's got a new gig that doesn't exist.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: The Most Hated Man in America?
programme.desc: Businessman Martin Shkreli raises the price of a life-saving drug 5,000 percent, but it's his shady accounting and Internet trolling that lands the "Pharma Bro" in hot water.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Mike The Situation Sorrentino flaunts washboard abs and a party boy image, but when it comes to paying his taxes, he'd rather play than pay.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: An artsy German heiress Anna Delvey makes a splash in Downtown New York's social scene, but she's really a Russian-born con artist who's trying to swindle $23 million from banks while dodging unpaid bills.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A trio of Texas conmen score $100 million by telling investors there's big money in the life settlement insurance business.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A charismatic New Mexico real estate broker scams $75 million in a fake land investment program.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: With his long beard, ponytail, and ubiquitous advertising, Jamie Balagia - AKA The DWI Dude - is well-known in Texas as flamboyant defense attorney who can get drunk driving defendants out of a jam.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Junk in a Box; Been Caught Stealing
programme.desc: Cancer charities that raise millions but gives only three percent to patients and families; a family brings in millions by shoplifting in a nationwide crime spree caught on camera.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Nine people are killed and thousands sickened when a CEO knowingly ships peanut products tainted with salmonella.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A man convinces people that he is a movie producer and money management professional while collecting millions to promote his own image.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: James Henrikson schemes to strike it rich in the North Dakota oil fields and he lets no one get in his way. Because when they do, they die.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Former quarterback Art Schlichter was once a living legend at Ohio State University; when he sinks into a gambling addiction, he throws it all away becoming a fast-talking con artist whose only game is looking for the next score.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A once $100 million publishing fortune creates tension between mother and son when he's accused of squandering millions on sex, diamonds and fraud.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Federal agents seek to unmask the anonymous mastermind of the world's largest online and underground drug bazaar, despite potential corruption within their own ranks.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A neighborhood ice cream parlor in West Roxbury, Mass., lands the Palladino family in a major case of fraud.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Hack Me if You Can; Goodfella Gone Bad
programme.desc: A 28-year-old hacker named Daniel Rigmaiden allegedly steals millions of dollars from the U.S. government; a wise-guy wannabe, in witness protection creates a mortgage fraud scam.
